titleStmt.title: Wisdom's dictates, or, Aphorisms & rules, physical, moral, and divine, for preserving the health of the body, and the peace of the mind ... to which is added a bill of fare of seventy five noble dishes of excellent food, for exceeding those made of fish or flesh ... / by Tho. Tryon.
titleStmt.author: Tryon, Thomas, 1634-1703.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
